titleInfo.title: Complete Genome Sequence of Pseudomonas sp. Strain MM213, an Isolate from a Brookside in Bielefeld, Germany

mods.abstract: Here, we report the genome sequence of Pseudomonas sp. strain MM213, isolated from brookside soil in Bielefeld, Germany. The genome is complete and consists of 6,746,355bp, with a GC content of 59.4% and 6,145 predicted protein-coding sequences. Pseudomonas sp. strain MM213 is part of the Pseudomonas mandelii group.
